keyFacts: The document is an emergency contact form for an employee of LSJE, LLC, dated April 9, 2018.
LSJE, LLC is located at 6100 Red Hook Quarters Suite B-3 in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The form includes fields for employee name, date of birth, address, emergency contacts, and medical information, though most are blank in this sample.
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting LSJE, LLC may be connected to Jeffrey Epstein's network of companies or associates.
